q: Adam Lashinsky reports for Fortune. Adam Lashinsky reports,`` Eric Schmidt also challenged the assertion that Google is locked in a competitive battle with Facebook.` We have a competitor called Microsoft,'' he said. Microsoft has more cash, more engineers, more global reach. We see competition from Microsoft every day.' `` Eric Schmidt also took on Google's competition with Apple. proposal intended to incite a panicked response to a phony crisis,'' Bill Lockyer , a Democrat, said during a conference call with reporters organized by the Economic Policy Institute, a Washington, D.C., think tank. Killer bees, space aliens... now it's the invasion of the bankrupt states. The truth is, no state wants to declare bankruptcy, no state needs to declare bankruptcy, and no state would.
